tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE educational_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_name VARCHAR(100),
    resource_url VARCHAR(255),
    resource_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LectureVideos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    duration INT,
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ReadingMaterials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT,
    published_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SimulationTools (
    tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE lecture_videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    video_title TEXT,
    video_description TEXT,
    video_url VARCHAR(255),
    uploaded_by TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reading_materials (
    material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_title TEXT,
    material_type TEXT,
    material_topic TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    uploaded_by TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE simulation_tools (
    tool_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name TEXT,
    tool_description TEXT,
    supported_platforms TEXT[],
    uploaded_by TEXT
);
